attributes.action: Ban the importing and manufacture of gas guzzlers with engines over 2.5 litres or 2500cc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help save the environment by banning the importing and manufacture in this country of cars with engine size over 2.5 litres (2500cc), and the ones running on the roads now should have their road tax doubled.
